scripts.test:api: ts-node --compiler-options "{\"module\":\"CommonJS\"}" -e "const {TestLogger} = require('./test-suite/test-logger'); const {APITestSuite} = require('./test-suite/api-tests'); const logger = new TestLogger(); const suite = new APITestSuite(logger); suite.runAllTests().then(() => { logger.printSummary(); logger.saveResults(); }).catch(console.error);"
